solution_criteria: Must include S3 bucket resource definition, versioning configuration, PublicAccessBlockConfiguration with all four blocking parameters set to true, and proper AWS CloudFormation syntax

solution_criteria: Must include a function that validates ARN format using string parsing or regex, extracts account ID and resource name, handles edge cases, and returns structured results

task: Create a regular expression that matches valid AWS S3 bucket names according to AWS naming rules (lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens only, 3-63 characters, starts and ends with letter or number)
